mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ROOM ( ROOM_ID, ROOM_NUMBER, ROOM_CLASS, RESERV_DATE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{roomNumber}, #{roomClass}, #{reservDate}, SYSDATE, #{createdId}, SYSDATE, #{updatedId} )
